Localisation.Text: The city holds many opportunities for a new start, for those that seek them out.
You discover a tunnel leading from the ancient ruin deep underground. It may be full of treasure.
Before you can brave the wilds, you first have to grind out some levels. Kill the nearby wildlife and collect that experience!
All adventurers know that to take on the most dangerous locations you need a party.
You have been given a bounty to slay an especially large rat that has been terrorizing the area.
Tales of forgotten treasures left deep within an ancient ruin have drawn you to this place. Explore and take everything you can find!
